EPD Declared Unit: Declared Unit Façade (2400x3600mm), Conversion factor to 1kg,  Conversion factor to 1m2. Aream2=2.4*3.6=8.64m2
1 ton of clay brick. Assuming building uses Façade Cladding clay bricks (RT_60 285x135x60) where bricks/m2 = 47 bricks and 2.8kg/brick.
Conversion Formula 1: Carbon figure for 1kg of bricks = GWP/1000
Conversion Formula 2: Total Weight of 1m2 of bricks = 47*2.8 = 131.6kg Carbon figure for 1m2 of bricks = GWPkg*131.6
